q: " It wasn't about putting lipstick on a pig, said Jackson. "It was to transform the pig into a handsome prince. And they did it!" The transformation, he said, took an attention to detail on the engineering side that you can't fake. I have nothing but admiration for Sergio Marchionne for unleashing it, and for his team for executing it. Indeed, nobody, except maybe Sergio Marchionne himself, believed Chrysler could redo its product line so dramatically in 18 months.
